wikipedia_page.main: Harold Stanley Kalms, Baron Kalms (born 21 November 1931) is the life president and former chairman of Currys plc (formerly DSG International plc, Dixons Group, Dixons Carphone). Currys plc owns Currys, as well as the now phased-out brands "PC World", "Team Knowhow" (in-house services) and various international electronics retailers. Dixons Retail merged with Carphone Warehouse in October 2014 to become Dixons Carphone (later Currys plc).  He spent his entire career from 1948 working for Dixons, which was founded by his father Charles Kalms in 1937.He was Chairman of Volvere plc, a British turnaround group, from 2002 – 2011.

response: *  1931   – Stanley Kalms, Baron Kalms, English businessman
